title: Echo Task List — Living Prioritized Task Board
spec:
## Echo Task List — Living Prioritized Task Board

### Goal
Transform the Echo tab into a living, constantly-prioritized task list. Tasks come from three sources: manual user tasks, AI-generated recommendations, and system alerts.

### Task Sources
- **Manual**: User creates via chat ("remind me to follow up with Acme") or UI (Add Task button)
- **AI-generated**: Proactive suggestions from strategy analysis, enrichment results, campaign performance
- **System alerts**: Pipeline completions, send failures, import results, stale data warnings

### Chat Tools (Requires AGENT)
- `add_task(title, description, priority, due_date, linked_entity)` — Create a task
- `update_task(task_id, fields)` — Update priority, due date, description, status
- `complete_task(task_id)` — Mark as done
- `get_prioritized_tasks(limit)` — Get sorted task list for AI reasoning
- `suggest_tasks(focus_area)` — Analyze strategy/campaigns/enrichment and suggest new tasks

### Data Model
- `tasks` table: id, tenant_id, user_id, title, description, source, priority, status, due_date, snoozed_until, linked_entity_type, linked_entity_id, ai_context (JSONB), dedup_key (unique per tenant)
- Sources: manual, ai_strategy, ai_enrichment, ai_campaign, system
- Priorities: critical, high, medium, low
- Statuses: open, completed, dismissed, snoozed

### API Endpoints
- `GET /api/tasks` — List with filters (status, source, priority, linked_entity_type)
- `POST /api/tasks` — Create (with dedup_key support for AI/system tasks)
- `PATCH /api/tasks/:id` — Update fields
- `DELETE /api/tasks/:id` — Hard delete
- `POST /api/tasks/prioritize` — AI-powered reprioritization

### UI
- Grouped sections: Overdue, Today, Upcoming, Recently Completed
- Task cards: priority indicator, source badge, due date, linked entity link, AI context (expandable)
- Actions: Done, Snooze (tomorrow/next week/next month/custom), Dismiss
- Filters: All, Overdue, High Priority, AI Suggested, System
- Empty state with onboarding CTA

### Integration Points
- Pipeline completion → system task
- Email/LinkedIn send failure → system task
- Strategy gap analysis → AI task
- Campaign performance drop → AI task
- Stale tasks (>14 days) get visual badge

### Acceptance Criteria
- Given user says "remind me to call Acme Thursday", AI creates task with due date
- Given enrichment completes, system task appears with results summary
- Given 10 open tasks, list is sorted: overdue first, then by priority and due date
- Given user clicks Done, task moves to Recently Completed section
- Given user asks "what should I focus on?", AI returns top tasks with reasoning
- Given duplicate dedup_key, existing task is refreshed instead of creating duplicate
description: The Echo tab becomes a living, constantly-prioritized task list. Tasks from three sources: (1) manual user tasks captured from chat or UI, (2) AI-generated tasks from strategy analysis, enrichment results, and campaign performance, (3) system alerts from pipeline events, send failures, and import completions. Chat tools: `add_task`, `update_task`, `complete_task`, `get_prioritized_tasks`, `suggest_tasks`. Dedup prevents duplicate AI/system tasks. Priority sort: overdue first, then by priority level and due date. Snooze, dismiss, and complete lifecycle. Linked entities navigate to company/campaign/contact detail views.
